page.title: 06THE NEW BIDEFORD BRIDGE SITE
page.content:
ON TUESDAY 9TH JULY THE FOURTH YEARS WENT TO{CHIRCOMBE}WHERE THE NEW BIDEFORD BRIDGE IS BEING BUILT. A MAN TALKED TO US, AND TOLD US THEIR PLANS. THIS IS WHAT WE FOUND OUT:
1. THE BRIDGE WILL BE 613.85 M.{LONG. 2. 33.213 M.{ABOVE GROUND LEVEL. 3. THERE ARE 9{PIERS.}(COLUMNS) 4. EACH COLUMN HAS BEEN DRIVEN INTO THE{RIVER BED}ABOUT 8 M. THE LAST 2 M. ARE{SOLID ROCK. 5. 20{FIRMS}ARE WORKING ON THE SITE. 6. AT{HIGH TIDE}NO MORE THAN 6 PEOPLE WORK ON THE BRIDGE. 7. AT{LOW TIDE}AT LEAST 30 PEOPLE WORK ON THE BRIDGE. 8. PLANNED TO BE{FINSHED}BY SPRING 87 BUT THEY HAVE HAD THEIR{PROBLEMS} AND{MAY NOT FINSH}IT FOR ANOTHER 4 YEARS 9. ALTOGETHER IT WILL{COST}Â£6,000,000.
